# Generated VitePress Documentation Site

This documentation site is generated by `dartdoc_vitepress` from Dart source code.

## Generated files (DO NOT edit — will be overwritten)

- `api/**` — API reference pages from Dart doc comments
- `topics/**` — Category/topic pages
- `guide/_generated/**` — Guide pages from `doc/` directory
- `.vitepress/generated/api-sidebar.ts` — API sidebar navigation
- `.vitepress/generated/guide-sidebar.ts` — Guide sidebar navigation
- `.vitepress/generated/api-styles.css` — API syntax highlighting styles

## Scaffold files (safe to edit — created once, never overwritten)

- `package.json` — npm dependencies and scripts
- `.vitepress/config.ts` — VitePress configuration
- `.vitepress/theme/index.ts` — Theme setup (composables, imports)
- `.vitepress/theme/custom.css` — Custom styles
- `.vitepress/theme/components/` — Vue components (DartPad, ApiBreadcrumb)
- `.vitepress/theme/plugins/` — markdown-it plugins (dartpad, api-linker)
- `index.md` — Homepage
- `guide/index.md` — Guide landing page
- `guide/*.md` — User guide pages (not touched by generator)
